about_the_game:
4 Additional brawlers join Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2! Grab all 4 of these additional brawlers at a great value and receive a bonus SpongeBob Squarepants “The Quickster” costume to best your foes in style.

This season pass features:
- 4 additional brawlers
- Bonus SpongeBob Squarepants "The Quickster" Costume

Note:
Brawlers contained in this pack are also sold separately and released throughout 2024.

In order to use this downloadable content, you will need Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 (sold separately).

In order to use this downloadable content, you will need Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 (sold separately).
